## withCancelPending() function

Wrap a cancellable task to cancel tasks still pending when another concurrent task's promise either rejected in a Promise.all() or won in a Promise.race().

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default function withCancelPending<TResult>(cancellableTask: CancellableTask<TResult>, outerRaceCancel?: RaceCancel): Promise<TResult>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  cancellableTask | [CancellableTask](./race-cancellation.cancellabletask.md)<!-- -->&lt;TResult&gt; | a [CancellableTask](./race-cancellation.cancellabletask.md) function to run with cancel pending |
|  outerRaceCancel | [RaceCancel](./race-cancellation.racecancel.md) | an optional outer [RaceCancel](./race-cancellation.racecancel.md) function |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;TResult&gt;
